snippet: Joseph Haj, one of the few Arab-American artistic directors in the country, will take over at the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis on July 1.
abstract: Joseph Haj, one of the few Arab-American artistic directors in the country, will take over at the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis on July 1.

headline.main: New Artistic Director for Guthrie Theater
headline.print_headline: Guthrie Theater Getting A New Artistic Director
